body_html: The benchmark doesn't even measure the time of actual GPU work. You're measuring the overhead of CPU-side kernel launch overhead. I'd recommend using e.g. nvprof + nvvp to see how much time do the kernels actually use.
body_text: The benchmark doesn't even measure the time of actual GPU work. You're measuring the overhead of CPU-side kernel launch overhead. I'd recommend using e.g. nvprof + nvvp to see how much time do the kernels actually use.
body: The benchmark doesn't even measure the time of actual GPU work. You're measuring the overhead of CPU-side kernel launch overhead. I'd recommend using e.g. `nvprof` + `nvvp` to see how much time do the kernels actually use.
